name: Worbital
overview: Break the Space! Worbital is space war in real-time with tension-filled gameplay and gravitational destruction. Interplanetary Artillery Warfare Exploit the shifting gravity by maneuvering your shots across space to inflict maximum damage on the enemy. Sling asteroids, create black holes, make it rain with solar flares! Cosmic Chaos Planets blow up. They might take other planets with them. Then the sun explodes. Then the real fun begins. Preparation, Building, Tactics Railguns, Lasers, World Rammers, Magnets, Orbit Boosters, Shield Defenses, Attack Ships, Colonizers… Pick your loadout from dozens of unique weapons! Hype-Filled Obliteration of Your Close and Distant Friends Make your opponents scream with perfectly-timed attacks and defenses, and hope they’re still your friends the next day.
